preconditions.precondition: The User Research Team needs to search for potential NFS participants.

mainSequence.step: User Researcher searches for potential participants based on interview topic.
User Research Management System queries NSF Staff Database for experts.
NSF Staff Database returns list of potential NSF participants.
User Research Management System presents potential participants.
User Researcher selects NSF participants for interviews.
User Research Management System sends invitation emails with interview details.
NSF Person RSVPs to the interview invitation.
User Research Management System confirms NSF participant RSVPs.
